message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of finding the best training data for a learning algorithm, which is a core problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The focus is on active sequential learners, which are commonly used in human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also formulates the problem as a Markov decision process, which is a common tool in control theory and robotics (cs.SY).
